title: The ultimate 11s grouse sandwich
description: A meaty open sandwich perfect for an indulgent brunch or light supper. Substitute  with other game meats, if you prefer.
ingredients: 2 free-range egg yolks, at room temperature
250ml/9fl oz sunflower oil or vegetable oil
squeeze lemon, plus extra, if needed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
